Equipment Actions.Action 1: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 17 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Sphinx makes 2 Claw attacks
Other Actions.Action 2: Roar, The Sphinx emits a magical roar, the effect of which changes each time.  The First Roar causes magical illusions to frighten.  The Second Roar is much louder, deafening creatures that hear it, frightening creatures and paralyzing them.  The Third Roar is the deadliest, and few have survived, even fewer could relay the details of the Roar.

Abilities.Ability 1: Inscrutable, The Sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses.  Uh oh, what have you done
Abilities.Ability 2: Magic Weapons, The Sphinx's weapon attacks are magical
Abilities.Ability 3: Spellcasting, The Sphinx is a 12th level spellcaster with a number of Cleric spells prepared

Damage Immunities.Damage 2: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks

Legendary Actions.Action 1: Claw Attack, The Sphinx makes one Claw attack
Legendary Actions.Action 2: Teleport, The Sphinx magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see
Legendary Actions.Action 3: Cast a Spell, The Sphinx casts one of its prepared spells

Lair Actions.Action 1: The Sphinx alters the flow of time, forcing creatures to reroll initiative
Lair Actions.Action 2: The Sphinx alters time, causing creatures to become older or younger
Lair Actions.Action 3: The Sphinx jerks time forwards or backwards by 10 years.  Why do we know its 10?  Some very lucky adventurers who ran away
Lair Actions.Action 4: The Sphinx shifts itself and other creatures it can see to another plane of existance
